name: producthunt_scrape_product
description: Scrape full product details from a Product Hunt product page. Returns name, tagline, description, upvotes, maker info, topics, gallery images, and external links.

steps.code: const nameEl = document.querySelector('h1, [data-test="post-name"], [class*="post-title"]'); const taglineEl = document.querySelector('[class*="tagline"], [data-test="post-tagline"], h1 + p, h2'); const descEl = document.querySelector('[class*="description"], [data-test="post-description"], [class*="body"] p'); const upvotesEl = document.querySelector('[class*="vote"] span, [class*="upvote"] span, button[class*="vote"] span'); const websiteEl = document.querySelector('a[data-test="post-website"], a[class*="website"], a[href*="utm_source=producthunt"]'); const topicEls = document.querySelectorAll('[class*="topic"] a, [class*="tag"] a, a[href*="/topics/"]'); const topics = []; topicEls.forEach(function(el) { const t = el.textContent.trim(); if (t && t.length < 50 && !topics.includes(t)) topics.push(t); }); const makerEls = document.querySelectorAll('[class*="maker"] a, [class*="hunter"] a, [data-test="maker-link"]'); const makers = []; makerEls.forEach(function(el) { const t = el.textContent.trim(); if (t && t.length < 80 && !makers.includes(t)) makers.push(t); }); const galleryEls = document.querySelectorAll('[class*="gallery"] img, [class*="carousel"] img, [class*="media"] img'); const images = []; galleryEls.forEach(function(img) { const src = img.getAttribute('src') || ''; if (src && !images.includes(src)) images.push(src); }); const dateEl = document.querySelector('time, [class*="launch-date"], [class*="date"]'); const pricingEl = document.querySelector('[class*="pricing"], [class*="price"]'); const logoEl = document.querySelector('[class*="logo"] img, [class*="thumbnail"] img'); return { name: nameEl ? nameEl.textContent.trim() : '', tagline: taglineEl ? taglineEl.textContent.trim() : '', description: descEl ? descEl.textContent.trim().substring(0, 1000) : '', upvotes: upvotesEl ? upvotesEl.textContent.trim() : '', website: websiteEl ? websiteEl.href : '', topics: topics.slice(0, 5), makers: makers.slice(0, 5), launch_date: dateEl ? (dateEl.getAttribute('datetime') || dateEl.textContent.trim()) : '', pricing: pricingEl ? pricingEl.textContent.trim() : '', logo: logoEl ? logoEl.getAttribute('src') : '', images: images.slice(0, 6), url: window.location.href }
steps.name: product_data
steps.label: Extract product details
